document_data.name: Court
document_data.mainbody: '''The Court''' was one of the [[divine realm]]s of [[Tyr]], the God of Law.
document_data.Description: The Court included a massive [[marble]] hall from which Tyr ruled his realm much like a court of law. It was impossible to lie in Tyr's realm.
document_data.Location: The Court was on the summit of one of three great mountains surrounding the base of [[Mount Celestia]], making it—from the point of view of the [[Great Wheel cosmology]]—a part of [[Lunia]] or—from the point of view of the [[World Tree cosmology]]—a part of the [[House of the Triad]]. The realm was adjacent to that of [[Siamorphe]], whose [[Alabaster Palace]] was located in a lush vale between the Court and Celestia.
